page.title: 08A MIXED FARM
page.content: On our farm there are six men. 3 look after the animals. The other 3 drive tractors and my Dad drives the combine in the harvest time. When the corn is ripe. The farm is quite big. And in the Summer holidays we have 2 donkies from the beach and give children rides.The other animals are cows but they are not dairy cows and then we have sheep which have been sheared because it is that time of the year.The tractors which we have are Fords and our combined is a Massey Ferguson.On our farm we have 2 sheds 1 shed has the combine and some corn in it. And the other one has tools and tractors in it.
